metadata.name: The Philosopher's Stone
metadata.description:
The Philosopher's stone is a new active item in the shop item pool that can be used 3 times. Upon use, it will turn some of the pickups on the ground into their golden variants! This includes coins, keys, bombs, pills, batteries, chests, trinkets, and trollbombs! It will also temporarily freeze enemies in the room into golden statues. Use it wisely, as it can only be used 3 times, and costs 20 coins to buy instead of the usual 15.
Now includes a new Challenge: "Gold Rush!", which gives you a 6 room charge Philosopher Stone that can be used an infinite amount of times
Note: The item will turn pickups into gold even if you don't have the golden pickup unlocked. For example, hearts will still be converted into golden hearts even if you dont have challenge #21 completed [h1] Update! [/h1] [list] [*]Can now be used 3 times. After the first use, it has a 6 room charge until you can use it again. [*]Now includes a new Challenge: "Gold Rush!", which gives you a 6 room charge Philosopher Stone that can be used an infinite amount of times [/list] [h1]Item Conversions[/h1] You can even convert some item pedestals into their golden counterparts. This includes [list] [*]Iron Bar ->Midas touch [*]Razor -> Golden razor [*]Teleport -> Teleport 2.0 [*]Circle of protection -> Dad's ring [*]Brother bobby -> King baby [*]Latch key -> Mom's key [*]There's options -> More options [*]Options? -> More options [/list] Has Extenal Item Descriptions support
Known Bugs/Issues: *Sucking it up with void instantly uses it
